map.name: OSM: Mapnik (German Style)
Reit und Wanderkarte (Overlay)
map.code: new OpenLayers.Layer.XYZ('Reit und Wanderkarte', 'http://topo.wanderreitkarte.de/topo/${z}/${x}/${y}.png', {isBaseLayer:false, visibility: false})

map.name: ADFC Radwegenetz
map.code: new OpenLayers.Layer.TMS( "ADFC Radwegenetz", "",{ type: 'png', getURL: get_mm_bikeTracks, displayOutsideMaxExtent: true, attribution: 'ADFC', opacity: 1, isBaseLayer: false, visibility: false, numZoomLevels: 17, noOpaq: true } )

map.name: Public Transport
map.code: new OpenLayers.Layer.OSM("Public Transport","http://openptmap.de/tiles/${z}/${x}/${y}.png", { maxZoomLevel: 17, numZoomLevels: 18, isBaseLayer: false, visibility: false })

map.name: Hillshading and Contourlines (dark)
map.code: new OpenLayers.Layer.XYZ("Hillshading and Contourlines (dark)", "http://www.wanderreitkarte.de/hills/${z}/${x}/${y}.png",{minZoomLevel: 9, maxZoomLevel: 19 , isBaseLayer:false, visibility: false })

map.name: Hikingways
map.code: new OpenLayers.Layer.XYZ("Hikingways", "http://osm.lonvia.de/hiking/${z}/${x}/${y}.png", { type: 'png', isBaseLayer: false, visibility: false, numZoomLevels: 17} )
